                           int marks,
                           int t,
                           int tot_questions,
                           int code,
                           int stu_id)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException,
                           java.io.IOException
        This function passes the exam info
        Parameters:
        name - This represents the exam name
        marks - This represents the exam marks
        t - This represents the exam time
        tot_questions - This represents the total number of exam questions
        code - This represents the exam code
        stu_id - This represents the student Id
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.io.IOException
